                    Liver cancer is uncommon in the United States, but is the fourth most common cancer in the world. In the United States, men, especially Chinese American men, have a greater risk of developing liver cancer.",CancerGov,Liver (Hepatocellular) Cancer
Who is at risk for Liver (Hepatocellular) Cancer? ?,"Having hepatitis or cirrhosis can increase the risk of developing liver cancer. Anything that increases the chance of getting a disease is called a risk factor. Having a risk
